roles.title: Administrator
roles.description: Administrator has permissions to create, read, update and delete users

roles.title: Facilitator
roles.description: Facilitator has permissions to create, read, update and delete decisions, and to post comments

roles.title: Voter
roles.description: Voter has permissions to view decisions, create votes and post comments

roles.title: Viewer
roles.description: Viewer has permissions to view decisions and post comments
